PREFIX cr: <http://www.assero.co.uk/CrossReference#>
PREFIX isoC: <http://www.assero.co.uk/ISO11179Concepts#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
INSERT DATA 
{ 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> rdf:type cr:CrossReference . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> isoC:label "Label"^^xsd:string . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> cr:semantic "A Relationship"^^xsd:string . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> cr:description "This is the comment"^^xsd:string . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> cr:ordinal "1"^^xsd:positiveInteger . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> cr:canBeDeleted "false"^^xsd:boolean . 
<http://example.com/A#base_XR1> cr:canBeModified "false"^^xsd:boolean . 
}
